name: Lemon Herb Roasted Chicken
description: Tender roasted chicken infused with a zesty blend of lemon and herbs. Served with a side of roasted vegetables.
shortDescription: Zesty roasted chicken with herbs, served with veggies.

name: Quinoa and Avocado Salad
description: A refreshing salad featuring fluffy quinoa, ripe avocados, cherry tomatoes, and a tangy citrus dressing.
shortDescription: Quinoa and avocado salad with citrus dressing.

name: Shrimp Scampi Linguine
description: Delicious linguine pasta tossed in a garlic-infused olive oil with succulent shrimp, cherry tomatoes, and fresh parsley.
shortDescription: Shrimp scampi linguine with garlic and olive oil.

name: Berry Burst Smoothie
description: A vibrant and healthy smoothie bursting with the goodness of mixed berries, banana, and Greek yogurt.
shortDescription: Healthy smoothie with mixed berries and Greek yogurt.

name: Vegetarian Pad Thai
description: Classic Thai stir-fried noodles with tofu, bean sprouts, peanuts, and a flavorful tamarind sauce.
shortDescription: Vegetarian Pad Thai with tofu and peanuts.

name: Dark Chocolate Fondue
description: Indulge in a decadent dessert experience with a rich and velvety dark chocolate fondue served with fresh fruits and marshmallows.
shortDescription: Decadent dark chocolate fondue with fresh fruits.
